text:
I’m currently working on a project, and I have a question about the `{{set_response_code(404)}}` function.

When I use this function, it successfully triggers the 404 error page, but the resulting page lacks any CSS styling. I’ve noticed that my style sheets aren’t loading as expected. Is there a specific reason why this might be happening?

Any ideas you can provide would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your help!
